metadata.title: Friday, 1st November, 2024
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to start administering the R21 matrix malaria vaccine to children under five years (5) old in Luapula Province;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) whether the Government has conducted any research on the vaccine to prove its efficacy.

questions.minister: Minister of Small and Medium Enterprise Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to reserve the following categories of investments for Zambians:
(i) block making; (ii) chicken rearing; and (iii) egg production; and
(b) whether the Government has a deliberate policy that supports Zambians to venture into the investments above.
(a) what measures are being taken to promote tourism in the following areas:
(i) North Luangwa National Park; (ii) Nachikufu Cave; and (iii) Nabwalya and Mukungule Chiefdoms; and
(b) when the Government will award hunting concessions in North Luangwa National Park.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts
parts: (a) what the progress, in percentage terms, on the construction of the Kasama Stadium was, as of March, 2024;
(b) who the contractor for the project is;
(c) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a) what the number of the following categories of livestock in Chinsali District was, as of March, 2023:
(i) cattle; (ii) sheep; and (iii) goats; and
(b) what measures are being taken to promote livestock farming in the District.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a Subordinate Court building in Kazungula District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Green Economy and Environment
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to conduct drought and floods preparedness sensitisation programmes, countrywide;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what measures the Government is implementing to preserve water bodies; and
(d) what the water deficit in various sectors was, as of March, 2024.

questions.minister: Minister of Finance and National Planning
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to establish industrial yards at district level in order to enhance implementation of economic activities; and
(b) whether there are any economic planners employed at district level to enhance economic activities. ___________________________
